column2: cards_df <- data.frame(YellowCards = sapply(teams, function(team) sum(team$Yellow_Cards)), RedCards = sapply(teams, function(team) sum(team$Red_Cards)),
ggplot(cards_df, aes(area = YellowCards, fill = RedCards, label = Names)) +
labs(title = "Treemap of Club by Yellow and Red Cards Recieved", fill = "Red Cards")
